sections.heading: What Are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.

sections.heading: How We Use Cookies
sections.content: DesignWorks Bureau Ltd uses cookies to:
list: Understand how you use our website
Analyze website performance and usage patterns

sections.heading: Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content: We use several types of cookies on our website:

subsections.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. You cannot opt-out of these cookies.
These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often. This data helps us improve how our website works.
These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your language preference) and provide enhanced, more personal features.

These cookies are used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and your interests. They remember that you have visited our website and this information is shared with other organizations such as advertisers.

sections.heading: Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: We may use third-party services that set cookies on our website:

subsections.content: We use Google Analytics to analyze website usage and improve our services. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect information about your use of our website.
Our website may include social media features that may set cookies to enable proper functionality of these features.

sections.heading: Managing Cookies
sections.content: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie rights by setting your preferences in our cookie consent manager when you visit our website.

subsections.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. However, limiting cookies may impact your experience of our website.

sections.heading: Cookie Retention
sections.content: Cookies will remain on your device for the period of time specified in the cookie or until you delete them:
list: Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser
Persistent cookies remain on your device until they expire or you delete them
The expiration date is set in the cookie itself

sections.heading: Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page with a new effective date.
